function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 transmission within and between cities and city regions","Impact":"Severe impact on localities, neighbourhoods, homes, families, networks, and individual lives","Mitigation":"Implementing public health measures and non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs)","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing technologies, and vaccine distribution systems","People":"Residents, workers, commuters, travelers","Owner":"Local and national government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Social and economic consequences of implementing public health measures","Impact":"Profound social and economic consequences","Mitigation":"Addressing structural determinants of health and inequities, providing support to affected individuals and businesses","Technologies":"Digital platforms for financial and social support, economic recovery programs","People":"Impacted individuals, businesses, local and national governments","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, private sector"}]}
